storyInfo: Andoain, now working as a Nurturer for the Shrine of Nurtury, is attacked. Fiammetta and her friends save him. Fiammetta decides to drop the matter of Andoain's past actions for the time being, allowing him to complete his duties at the Nativity.

attributes.content: Citizen, if you are here to view the Nativity, please queue up at the security check line in the plaza.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: You've been dawdling here for a while.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I'm just waiting for someone...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: There is a large amount of traffic going in and out of the shrine today. We ask for your cooperation and to refrain from loitering.
attributes.name: Shrine Patrol

attributes.content: S-Sorry.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: El's been in there all day.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: The plan was to blow up important structural elements in the shrine to prevent the ceremony... whatever it's called... from being held as scheduled.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: She should have been out by now... don't tell me she's been caught?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: But I've been here all this time, and there's been no movement inside...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: But El must have ran into some kind of trouble that's holding her up...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Come on, Vani, think... what can you do?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I have two small Originium powder tubes that I could turn into an improvised bomb.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: It won't be very powerful, but it should cause enough commotion to distract the guards and allow El to...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Let's set it here.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: No one's paying any attention... all I need to do is set it off—
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Vannini's arm finds the barrel of a gun, preventing it from moving down any further.
Don't let that thing go boom, girl.
Stand up, slowly.
R-Reverend Gun-knight...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Those tools and all, you work at a firearms workshop?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I have ten minutes. Explain yourself, girl.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What are you up to here? Or should I say, who are you trying to cover for?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Let's go, El.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: What about Master Pag?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Magister's sleeping. His vision's been getting worse, and the doctor wants him to get plenty of rest.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: We shouldn't wake him if we're careful.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: There's something I need to tell you first, Vani.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's so weird when you talk all serious like that...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Ahem. Listen—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If you get caught, just give me up to whoever it is, whether it's the Pontifica Cohors, the executors, or the gun-knights. Don't worry about me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I came in the middle of the night, kicked your door open, and forced you to make bombs and stand guard for me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're an innocent little angel who doesn't know anything!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: That's my condition for letting you come with me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just because I'm shy doesn't mean I'm a coward!
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Haha. I know. And I'm glad you decided to help me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The Curia seems to be taking that ceremony very seriously. Who knows what punishment they have in store for somebody trying to bomb it?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Besides, Laterano is very different from how I remember it.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: No but's or what about's! I can handle this on my own.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Besides, Penguin Logistics company culture says, never share the glory when you can hoard it all for yourself!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: I-I came on my own.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Interesting girl.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Old men like me don't get a lot of chances to talk to the youth. Unfortunately, the ceremony is about to begin...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: If you won't talk, I'll have to hand you over to the executors of the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Stop right there, Patrizion!
Don't think I don't recognize that sanctimonious face of yours just because you're hiding it behind a hunk of sheet metal!
*pant* *pant* My... my legs...
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Pag?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What do you mean? Is something going on with the Holy City? Would you care to explain, or do I have to guess from your meaningful glances at one another?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: This is not related to our investigation, Sister.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: At this time, I have not determined that you need to know more.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: In any case, Arturia, you'll have to come back with us.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I don't dislike you. In fact, I am rather fond of you. But if your actions will bring harm to Landen Monastery, then I-I'll pull no punches!
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: May I ask you something, Sister Hildegard?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: You love the monastery and Laterano, don't you?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Or should I say—how did you establish an emotional connection to Laterano as a Liberi?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Well... I've lived at Landen Monastery for a long time. I was brought up by the brothers and sisters there, and we worked together to make bread and beer, doing our best to keep the monastery solvent.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I belong here. Of course I love this place.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: If you're asking why there are so many Liberis in the Holy City... you've read The Saints' Travels, haven't you?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Don't tell me you only used it to make your paper dragonfly...?
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: According to The Saints' Travels, the first encounter between the Liberi and Laterano began with a herd of burdenbeasts.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Many years ago, a group of Liberi were scattered by a herd of burdenbeasts while seeking water in the wilderness. The animals carried grain on their backs, forming an orderly procession as they traveled into the distance.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The Liberi spent great effort to hunt the burdenbeasts. They never imagined that these creatures of the wild could move in such orderly manner, so they followed the beasts.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Then, the Liberi saw the halo-bearers in the fields, singing as they guided the herd of burdenbeasts into the assembly of pearl-white buildings behind them.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: At a time when the Liberi still lived naked in the wild, seeking water and game, those people had learned to tame wild beasts, and build cities safe from Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: More importantly, the Liberi found that those people had a confidence and optimism that was alien to the Liberi.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Because of their halos, and 'empathy'...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: From the moment of their birth, they could feel each other's feelings and understand one another. They rarely knew conflict, and they were able to overcome crises that would destroy any other race.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: They created the perfect order, naming it the Law.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: I can understand that feeling.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Even as the Curia cut off funding to the monastery, even as its buildings fell into disrepair, even as I fretted over the monastery's books...
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: The Sanktas of Landen Monastery never seemed to fear that there might come a day when we would have to close our doors.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Their confidence and optimism let them accept the presence of the Liberi nearby, learning from them and becoming part of the whole.
attributes.name: Hildegard

attributes.content: Yes. Over the ages, the Sanktas have almost completely assimilated the Holy City's Liberi... other than the halo, which can never be shared.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: We are too special, able to take in everything... like a concerto with a clear main theme.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Laterano has never been just a warm, cozy little cottage for the Sanktas, Fede.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: After you escaped, you went searching for a 'missing pregnant woman' from a nomadic abbey, but there have been no such recent reports of a missing person in Notarial Hall records.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Explain yourself, Arturia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: A poor mother has gone missing in Laterano. A little incident that no one has paid any heed...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But, by chance, I had once touched the note of her heart while playing in the wheat fields—
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: And I discovered where she went.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Patience, Fede. Wait and see.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: We've come this far. You don't need me to explain it to you.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Is this the girl you took in?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: You'll have to forgive, Reverend Gun-knight, that I don't have the adoption papers on me.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: What? If you can take in a Liberi, why can't I take in a Sankta?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: She's a good girl. You know, you are the only Sankta I've ever had a real problem understanding.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: That mouth of yours...
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: How long has it been since we last met, Pag?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: I forget. Never thought much about it. Didn't think I would need to.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Back on topic: Your apprentice just attempted to—
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: On my orders.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: An act of protest. Is that so hard to understand?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: The Curia shut down over a hundred firearms workshops overnight. My livelihood for decades, the shop I counted on for my retirement, all gone in the blink of an eye.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: When I heard you were throwing some party here, I thought I might force the Curia to hear the voice of this humble citizen, in front of all these honored guests.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I should have done it myself, but I'm old, and my legs and eyes aren't what they used to be, so I had the girl run this errand for me.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I thought you had gone into a different line of work, Pag.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Screw that.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Why should I? When you still have the nerve to use that gun I made after you exiled Gia from Laterano?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: I just gave up being a dedicated supplier for you gun-knights.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: And how exactly do you plan on dealing with this?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: We're caught red-handed attempting to bomb the Shrine of Nurtury and sabotage the Nativity.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Will you once again 'escort' your friend out of Laterano, as a gun-knight sworn to protect the sanctity of Paradise?
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: One who just happens to be a Liberi as well.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: This has nothing to do with you being Liberi, Pag. If you have indeed violated the Law, then I have no choice but to suffer another parting.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: And yet... I see that no harm was actually done, was there?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Take your apprentice and go.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Come along, Vani.
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: (Grab onto me. I left in a hurry and forgot the new glasses you got me.)
attributes.name: Paganini

attributes.content: Reverend, the man's story doesn't stand up to scrutiny.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: The appropriate course of action would be to take them in for questioning and eliminate any potential risk...
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: That won't be necessary... besides, I don't need another fight with that old bloke.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: This bomb is simple, improvised. The girl obviously made it on the spot... which means that her accomplice is still inside.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Reassign an extra team of gun-knights and work with the patrols to ensure the shrine's security.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Yes, Reverend.
attributes.name: Gun-Knight

attributes.content: Strange. Is she still in the Shrine of Nurtury?
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Cardinal Aide Amos.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: R-Reverend Patrizion. L-Long time no see.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Long time indeed.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: What are you all worked up about?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Have you seen Cardinal Lemuen? There's something I wanted to check with her.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: She hasn't returned to the Seventh Tribunal since visiting the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: If this has something to do with the explosion, I must be kept in the loop.
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: Yes, Reverend.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I bumped into a Sankta on Via Borgos in Pagus Faber to complete the takeover of a firearms workshop. There was a visible reaction from the Cardinal when I mentioned this to her.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: I checked the appearance of the individual I encountered against the database of registered citizens, and found a match in the external personnel files.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: She must have been on the scene of the explosion in Pagus Stevonus. She has... certain ties to the Cardinal.
attributes.name: Amos

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Patrizion

attributes.content: ...I don't have much time, Sister. I must return to the Shrine of Nurtury.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Let me confirm: You're not sure if the individual currently under care will die, but you want to make funeral preparations for her?
attributes.name: Nun

attributes.content: Yes... she is not in good shape. I will do all that I can as her Nurturer.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But that will not preclude me from preparing for the worst.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: This seems so... un-Lateran.
attributes.name: Nun

attributes.content: What should a Lateran be like?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Now that's a complicated question...
attributes.name: Nun

attributes.content: Farewell—I hope we will not have cause to meet again.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I didn't believe it when they said it—But you really did come back here, Andoain.
This Ecclesia Requietum, this field of irises... are they familiar to you? Do you reminisce over them?
There are many Ecclesiae Requietorum in Laterano.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: As for reminiscing... it would be inappropriate for me to do that about an Ecclesia Requietum, in my present position.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I forgot. You're a high-and-mighty Nurturer now.
Who are you?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Was it you who followed me and attacked me in the shrine?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Followed? Attacked? Who's the one who's mad here, Andoain, you or me?
If you didn't want us to walk the same path as you, why did you call us 'Pathfinders'?
The sinister shrine that devours. Is it the righteous path that you've found, or one that has led you astray?
I do not recall promising to walk the same path as anyone, before I met the Matriarch...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: As for the Shrine of Nurtury, it's true that it has guided my path. But sinister? There must be some misunderstanding...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Enough, Andoain! Nugas garris! Don't play the fool with me!
A dozen of us never came back from the shrine! If the path you found demands our sacrifice, we at least deserve to be told.
Or, if you're really shameless enough to deny the connection, at least have the decency to say it to my face!
No, I don't understand...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You'll have plenty of time to figure it out.
Please, don't... there are many children I must care for... and that mother...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Argh—dammit!
It's them. Pull back!
If I didn't know better, I would say you were trying to hit Andoain with that one.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: He's proven hard enough to kill so far. I figured it was an acceptable risk.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fiammetta... Mostima...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You've really made yourself a lot of enemies, haven't you, Andoain?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'll go after them while you two talk.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's no need.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I don't know why they're targeting me, but I can't help but feel...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: They're determined. People like that inevitably have complex pasts and simple motivations.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How compassionate.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How could you do what you did to your own cohort, then?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why don't you repent before Mostima and Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why wouldn't you tell us what the one in the Lock and Key made you see, deep in that dungeon?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Why didn't you ever give us an answer?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Or, more accurately, share the question with us.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We must each follow our own paths, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Is that why you attacked Lemuen and fled, before coming back with that Matriarch, hiding in the Shrine of Nurtury under her protection like nothing ever happened? Is this your 'path'?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What 'salvation' did you find in the years that you went off the grid?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I never found salvation, nor do I feel like nothing ever happened.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: However, life is short, and if I do not find the answer I seek soon, my sins and your pain will become meaningless.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The day after I was released from Landen Monastery, I left Laterano, believing that I would find something.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The next five years were like a blur. All I remember is going from one place to another, alone, in many directions without end...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I often wonder if something has gone wrong with my memory.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And then, I found the Matriarch.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: She was headed for the Holy City, though she had been delayed greatly by helping the wounded and needy along the way.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: She made me believe that the answer still lies in Laterano.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: She promised me a miracle, and that thousands upon thousands more miracles will be born from us. I returned to Laterano to fulfill this promise with her.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Taceas! Just shut up! You're babbling to yourself and making zero sense.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Listen here, Andoain.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: After I kicked you out of that gathering the other day, Patrizion spent a long time telling me how important you, that shrine of yours, and the ceremony you're holding are.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I've never seen the old man so serious. So I promised him I wouldn't pick a fight with you. Yet.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I didn't save your life because I've forgiven you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You just don't deserve to die before you've truly repented for what you did and paid a proper price.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The Nativity is about to start, isn't it?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I must go.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Good morning.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Honored kindred, returned Messengers, emissaries from all across Terra, and guests who have set foot in the Holy City for the first time through the abbeys, I greet you.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This shrine in which we now find ourselves was not built to demonstrate Laterano's power and authority for the Summit of Nations.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: However, I am glad from the bottom of my heart that it was completed in time for all of us to gather here today.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: Every birth brings new possibilities... for the continuation of faith, for the fight against calamity. Only in this way can we shape the future.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: This is even more true for the Laterano of the future.
attributes.name: Matriarch

attributes.content: I bid you now, prepare, and listen to the heartbeat of new life.
attributes.name: Matriarch
